title: University of Leicester PATT linked travel grant
abstractText: This is a STFC linked PATT grant to support astronomers observations. With the grant we will observe using world class telescopes supported by STFC.
impactText: Findings have been published in peer reviewed journals
findingsText: This is a travel grant to allow astronomers to travel to telescopes to observe the universe. All the data acquired is available publicly in archives. Education
